name: Allenmop
body: Hello everybody. I'm looking for a demo of the game called X-Hex. The meaning of the game is this. Field lozenge. On the fields set dots. Thanks to these marks the field grows and becomes grand. At the moment when it begins to touch the opponent’s field. Tags begin move now to the enemy, then rearward. The winner is the one who fills the entire field. There bonuses, a call to an aircraft that randomly bombes the enemy’s fields and can hurt yours. Interesting toy. P.S. Thanks in advance You can reply to the mail: judbayneoranderson@gmail.com
